## isIdentity() function

Tests if a matrix is an identity matrix

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function isIdentity<S>(matrix: Matrix<S>): boolean;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  matrix | [Matrix](./vector.matrix.md)<!-- -->&lt;S&gt; |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

boolean

`true` if the matrix is an identity
